titleInfo.title: Invitation to the Mothers' Club Family Night Party

mods.abstract: Brother H. William, moderator of the Mothers' Club, invited parents to attend the Family Night party. Spaghetti and turkey dinners were on the menu - $1.00 a plate. A new car was raffled off. Funds raised would go toward paving asphalt roads on campus.
